entry.title: Welcome to RobyPomper.org
entry.summary: I'm happty to welcome you on my new personal web site.
entry.content:
I'm happty to welcome you on my new personal web site.

Here I'll collect all my personal projects related with IT, Makers and Sports. At this moment, this web site and his content is not completed and still some works to do...
But ok! It still enought to be published as a preview.

So see you soon and wish me ... good luck.
